prompt:
Create a horizontal banner showing 5 carousel slides in a row.

STYLE: ELEGANT PREMIUM - navy and cream, gold accents, serif font

Show 5 slides side by side. Each slide has bold text:
Slide1:'For You' Slide2:'Problem' Slide3:'Solution' Slide4:'Quote' Slide5:'Join'

Make it clean and cohesive in the Elegant Premium style for Apparel & Fashion.
